sources.title: Summer Storm (1944) LINDA DARNELL ♥ GEORGE SANDERS
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Linda Darnell, George Sanders, Edward Everett Horton, and Anna Lee
Director: Douglas Sirk

Born into poverty, a young peasant woman uses her dazzling appeal to improve her social standing. She sets her hooks into three men  -- the local magistrate, a decadent count, and an estate superintendent -- with tragic results. 

TRIVIA: Anton Chekhov's novel The Shooting Party was written in 1884, but this sizzling adaption is set during Revolutionary Russia.

metadata.Plot: In this filmed Chekhov adaptation, Olga is an alluring peasant woman who lures cynical aristocrat Fedor away from his milquetoast fiancée, with tragic consequences.
metadata.Writer: Rowland Leigh, Robert Thoeren, Anton Chekhov
metadata.Actors: Linda Darnell, George Sanders, Anna Lee
